channel.title: Rich Scape Commands help
channel.description:
Hey all, i switched to richscape which seems to be better,but how can i Add commands such as;
giveadmin givemod staff[for staff teleport only] please the actual code,since im utterley confused..

item.title: Rich Scape Commands help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

The staff is easy.
This one will probably work, just made off the top of my head.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME") && playerRights > 0) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("MESSAGE");

Read full topic

item.title: Rich Scape Commands help
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

jokerr:

Hey fuckface do you see “richscape”

Doesn’t fucking matter, all commands are set up the same. If (command.equalsIgnoreCase("") { UNLESS it’s actually different in richscape which I doubt. This shit is easy. This isn’t really even coding, it’s more like looking and copy and pasting. And you’re asking for “the actual code”, or basically asking for the code. We don’t spoonfeed here so here you go: www.java.com it. Take it home and chew it, it’s fucking delicious.

Read full topic
